article.title: Sierra Nevada to Provide Counter-IED Systems
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Sierra Nevada Corp., Sparks, Nev., was awarded a $56,566,107 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of individual counter radio control improvised explosive device (IED) electronic warfare systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, N.J., is the contracting activity.
